# setFormat(_:)

**Instance Method**

Sets the bus’s audio format.

## Declaration

```swift
func setFormat(_ format: AVAudioFormat) throws
```

## Parameters

- **format**: The desired audio format.

## Discussion

- [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] if the operation failed.

## Discussion

Audio units can generally be expected to support the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioFormat] standard format (deinterleaved 32-bit float), at any sample rate.

Channel counts can be more complex. See the [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/AUAudioUnit/channelCapabilities] reference for a more complete discussion.



## Bus Methods and Properties

- **format**: The audio format and channel layout of audio being transferred on the bus.
- **isEnabled**: Determines whether the bus is active.
- **name**: A name for the bus.
- **index**: The index of this bus in its containing array.
- **busType**: The bus type.
- **ownerAudioUnit**: The audio unit that owns the bus.
- **supportedChannelLayoutTags**: An array of audio channel layout tags.
- **contextPresentationLatency**: Information about latency in the audio unit’s processing context.
- **shouldAllocateBuffer**
